snippet: A private investigator in New York has pleaded guilty to hiring a hacker to help with his investigation.
abstract: Private investigator Eric Saldarriaga pleads guilty to conspiracy in hiring hacker to help his investigations for law firms that specialize in personal injury and medical malpractice litigation.
lead_paragraph: A private investigator in New York has pleaded guilty to hiring a hacker to help with his investigation.

headline.main: Investigator Admits Guilt in Hiring of a Hacker
headline.print_headline: Investigator Admits Guilt in Hiring of a Hacker
